page.title: 20Politics
page.content: Our area is spilt into two political wards.These wards are Barnfield Ward and Baxenden Ward.All the councillors are in the Hynburn Borough Council.In the political elections Barnfield Ward is represented by CA CB and Baxenden Ward is represented by DA DB.The councillors representing Barnfield Ward are M D.W.Keeley (Conservative) J Strak (SDP) and Mrs Y Stars (Liberal) E.Craig (Conservative) and J Dickinson also (Conservative).The local member of parliament is J K Hargreaves who is a member of the Conservative Party.His domain is a lot futher than our area but he covers our 12 blocks.Two polling stations in our area are Baxenden church of England school Christ Church Hall day nursery.
